DESCRI

decision_conditions: The lighting hereby approved shall only be illuminated between the hours of 1500hrs and 2345hrs on weekdays, and on feast days, weddings, baptisms, funerals and any other day that is authorised by the Parish Priest for special occasions.Reason: In order that the special architectural and historic character of this listed building is safeguarded in accordance with Policy CS8 (Character, Heritage and Design) and Policy DM12 (Development in Conservation Areas and Affecting Heritage Assets) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans, technical information sheets (i.e. Kingfisher Lighting Villa II specification sheet) and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
